    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      voiddownload(Boolean useProxy!)
      voiddownloadFile(Boolean useProxy!)

      Downloads the file from the specified download url. The boolean parameter is used to specify whether the download should use the defined proxy or the system properties.

      InputStreamgetResponseInputStream()
      BooleanisSiteReachable(Boolean useProxy!)

      Returns true if a connection could be established with the download url, false otherwise. The given boolean value defines whether to use the defined proxy or if the system properties should be used.

      BooleanwasDownloadSuccessful()

      Returns true if the file download was successful, false otherwise.

      • download

      • downloadFile

        public void downloadFile(Boolean useProxy!)

        Downloads the file from the specified download url. The boolean parameter is used to specify whether the download should use the defined proxy or the system properties.

        Parameters:
        useProxy! The boolean value indicating whether to use the defined proxy or the system properties

      • getResponseInputStream

        public InputStream getResponseInputStream()

      • isSiteReachable

        public Boolean isSiteReachable(Boolean useProxy!)

        Returns true if a connection could be established with the download url, false otherwise. The given boolean value defines whether to use the defined proxy or if the system properties should be used.

        Parameters:
        useProxy The boolean value indicating whether to use the defined proxy or not.
        Returns:
        true if the site can be reached, false otherwise.

      • wasDownloadSuccessful

        public Boolean wasDownloadSuccessful()

        Returns true if the file download was successful, false otherwise.

        Returns:
        true when the download was successful, false otherwise.
